title: Chief Product Officer
description: QURE, an exciting DeSci (Decentralized Science) Life Science Metaverse startup is looking for a Full Stack Developer to act as the Chief Product Officer (CPO)/Head of Product. Ideal candidates have worked in startup environments, enjoy working remotely, have an innovative mindset and are familiar with the Web 3.0 space. Full stack developer background required. Dev Ops experience required, VR experience preferred, Blockchain experience preferred, Life science industry experience preferred. Competing for 3 funding opportunities (Grants, Fellowships, Etc). Development already under way. Will get co-founder level stock options with highly innovative project.
